experiment_info.name: extended_kalman_filter_inversion
experiment_info.description: Extended Kalman Filter for heat source state estimation
experiment_info.hypothesis: EKF treats source params as hidden state and temperature as observations

tuning_runs.notes: Quick test with 5 samples shows EKF is completely unviable - 6x over budget, 10% worse accuracy

conclusion: FAILED - EKF is fundamentally unsuitable for this problem. Same issues as LM: (1) Local optimizer converges to nearest state estimate (local minima), (2) Jacobian computation requires state_dim+1 simulations per timestep, making it 6x slower than baseline. state_estimation family EXHAUSTED.
